name: Colorful Collections
description:
Balance work and play in this colourful adventure with a charming hand drawn aesthetic! Play minigames to complete your work tasks to open the exhibit on time, but don't forget to take care of yourself too.

Features

  • Watch color come back to your world in real time.
  • Original music and art
  • Narrative driven gameplay
  • Engaging mini games

Created as a prototype term project for CTIN 541 at the University of Southern California.

Credits

Producer/Writer: Lloyd Campbell III (Younglc3)
Artist/Sound Designer: Christopher Bowles
Programmer: Michael Wahba
